2.speaker: Karlach
2.text: What a pesthole! Can't wait to clear this place out.
2.context: NodeContext: Descending into the Bhaal Temple for a confrontation with Orin. Minsc and Karlach just want to skip the drama and get to the fighting.

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: There will be much trading of threats and insults, no doubt. But Minsc will be ready when it is time for boot to meet butt.
1.context: NodeContext: Descending into the Bhaal Temple for a confrontation with Orin. Minsc and Karlach just want to skip the drama and get to the fighting.
